Use your email and password to log in.en: Use your email and password to log in
Use your email and password to log in.es: Usa tu correo electrónico y contraseña para iniciar sesión
Use your email and password to log in.de: Verwenden Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse und Ihr Passwort, um sich anzumelden
Use your email and password to log in.fr: Utilisez votre e-mail et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter
Use your email and password to log in.it: Usa la tua email e password per accedere
Use your email and password to log in.ru: Используйте email и пароль для входа

Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.en: Let's ask about it in an artificial intelligence chat.
Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.es: Preguntemos sobre esto en un chat de inteligencia artificial.
Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.de: Lassen Sie uns dazu einen KI-Chat befragen.
Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.fr: Demandons à un chat d'intelligence artificielle.
Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.it: Chiediamolo in una chat di intelligenza artificiale.
Let's ask about it in an artificial inte.ru: Давайте спросим об этом в чате с искусственным интеллектом.

Viewing files in shared chats is current.en: Viewing files in shared chats is currently not supported.
Viewing files in shared chats is current.es: Actualmente no se admite la visualización de archivos en chats compartidos.
Viewing files in shared chats is current.de: Das Anzeigen von Dateien in geteilten Chats wird derzeit nicht unterstützt.
Viewing files in shared chats is current.fr: La visualisation des fichiers dans les chats partagés n'est actuellement pas prise en charge.
Viewing files in shared chats is current.it: La visualizzazione dei file nelle chat condivise non è attualmente supportata.
Viewing files in shared chats is current.ru: Просмотр файлов в общих чатах в настоящее время не поддерживается.

How can I help you today?.en: How can I help you today?
How can I help you today?.de: Wie kann ich Ihnen heute helfen?
How can I help you today?.ru: Чем я могу помочь вам сегодня?

There's no text to copy!.fr: Il n'y a pas de texte à copier !

Failed to upvote response..es: No se pudo votar positivamente la respuesta.
Failed to upvote response..de: Antwort konnte nicht positiv bewertet werden.

Failed to downvote response..es: No se pudo votar negativamente la respuesta.
Failed to downvote response..de: Antwort konnte nicht negativ bewertet werden.

Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.en: Now I'm going to explore the knowledge base. I need some time...
Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.es: Ahora voy a explorar la base de conocimientos. Necesito algo de tiempo...
Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.de: Jetzt werde ich die Wissensdatenbank durchsuchen. Ich brauche etwas Zeit...
Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.fr: Je vais maintenant explorer la base de connaissances. J'ai besoin d'un peu de temps...
Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.it: Ora esplorerò la base di conoscenza. Mi serve un po' di tempo...
Now I'm going to explore the knowledge b.ru: Сейчас я изучаю базу знаний. Мне нужно немного времени...

One more moment, and the answer will be.en: One more moment, and the answer will be ready in a second...
One more moment, and the answer will be.es: Un momento más y la respuesta estará lista en un segundo...
One more moment, and the answer will be.de: Noch einen Moment, und die Antwort ist gleich fertig...
One more moment, and the answer will be.fr: Encore un instant, et la réponse sera prête dans une seconde...
One more moment, and the answer will be.it: Ancora un attimo e la risposta sarà pronta tra un secondo...
One more moment, and the answer will be.ru: Ещё немного, и ответ будет готов через секунду...

Login to save and revisit previous chats.en: Login to save and revisit previous chats!
Login to save and revisit previous chats.es: Inicia sesión para guardar y volver a tus chats anteriores.
Login to save and revisit previous chats.de: Melde dich an, um frühere Chats zu speichern und erneut aufzurufen.
Login to save and revisit previous chats.fr: Connectez-vous pour enregistrer et retrouver vos discussions précédentes.
Login to save and revisit previous chats.it: Accedi per salvare e rivedere le chat precedenti.
Login to save and revisit previous chats.ru: Войдите, чтобы сохранять и просматривать предыдущие чаты!

Your conversations will appear here once.en: Your conversations will appear here once you start chatting!
Your conversations will appear here once.es: Tus conversaciones aparecerán aquí cuando comiences a chatear.
Your conversations will appear here once.de: Deine Unterhaltungen erscheinen hier, sobald du zu chatten beginnst.
Your conversations will appear here once.fr: Vos conversations apparaîtront ici lorsque vous commencerez à discuter.
Your conversations will appear here once.it: Le tue conversazioni appariranno qui quando inizierai a chattare.
Your conversations will appear here once.ru: Ваши беседы появятся здесь, когда вы начнёте чатить!

Older than last month.fr: Plus ancien que le mois dernier

You have reached the end of your chat hi.en: You have reached the end of your chat history.
You have reached the end of your chat hi.es: Has llegado al final de tu historial de chat.
You have reached the end of your chat hi.de: Du hast das Ende deines Chatverlaufs erreicht.
You have reached the end of your chat hi.fr: Vous avez atteint la fin de votre historique de chat.
You have reached the end of your chat hi.it: Hai raggiunto la fine della cronologia chat.
You have reached the end of your chat hi.ru: Вы дошли до конца истории чатов.

This action cannot be undone. This will.en: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your chat and remove it from our servers.
This action cannot be undone. This will.es: Esta acción no se puede deshacer. Esto eliminará permanentemente tu chat y lo eliminará de nuestros servidores.
This action cannot be undone. This will.de: Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden. Dadurch wird dein Chat dauerhaft gelöscht und von unseren Servern entfernt.
This action cannot be undone. This will.fr: Cette action est irréversible. Cela supprimera définitivement votre discussion de nos serveurs.
This action cannot be undone. This will.it: Questa azione non può essere annullata. Questo eliminerà definitivamente la tua chat dai nostri server.
This action cannot be undone. This will.ru: Это действие необратимо. Чат будет удалён без возможности восстановления.

Failed to delete chat.es: No se pudo eliminar el chat
Failed to delete chat.fr: Échec de la suppression du chat

You are viewing a previous version.en: You are viewing a previous version

Restore this version to make edits.en: Restore this version to make edits
Restore this version to make edits.es: Restaura esta versión para hacer ediciones
Restore this version to make edits.de: Stellen Sie diese Version wieder her, um Änderungen vorzunehmen
Restore this version to make edits.fr: Restaurez cette version pour apporter des modifications
Restore this version to make edits.it: Ripristina questa versione per apportare modifiche
Restore this version to make edits.ru: Восстановите эту версию для внесения изменений

Checking authentication status, please t.en: Checking authentication status, please try again!
Checking authentication status, please t.es: Verificando el estado de autenticación, ¡por favor inténtalo de nuevo!
Checking authentication status, please t.de: Authentifizierungsstatus wird überprüft, bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
Checking authentication status, please t.fr: Vérification du statut d'authentification, veuillez réessayer !
Checking authentication status, please t.it: Controllo dello stato di autenticazione, riprova!
Checking authentication status, please t.ru: Ошибка проверки статуса аутентификации, пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз!

Login to your account.de: Melden Sie sich bei Ihrem Konto an
